search.name: lyricsfind.com
search.description:
Search for song lyrics. Default search is by title.
NOTE: The search engine remembers your last used search type, so the switches may not always be necessary.
Switches:
/title - Search by song title (Default)
/artist - Search by artist name
Examples:
lf fight the power /title
lf public enemy /artist
